name: Weekly Report
title: Weekly Report - Week of [Date]
description:
Compile and review weekly progress report including:
- Key accomplishments
- Challenges faced
- Upcoming priorities
- Metrics and KPIs

name: Daily Standup Prep
title: Prepare for Daily Standup
description:
Review yesterday's work and prepare standup updates:
- What I did yesterday
- What I plan to do today
- Any blockers or impediments

name: Code Review
title: Code Review - [Feature/PR Name]
description:
Review pull request for quality, functionality, and adherence to coding standards:
- Check code logic and efficiency
- Verify test coverage
- Ensure documentation is updated
- Test functionality

name: Team Meeting
title: Team Meeting - [Topic]
description:
Schedule and prepare for team meeting:
- Set agenda
- Prepare talking points
- Send calendar invites
- Prepare presentation materials

name: Monthly Expense Report
title: Monthly Expense Report - [Month Year]
description:
Compile and submit monthly expense report:
- Gather all receipts
- Categorize expenses
- Fill out expense form
- Submit for approval
